title: wine_Sante_Arcangeli_2012_Split_Rail_Vineyard_Pinot_Noir_(Santa_Cruz_Mountains)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 104221.
country: US.
description: With a pale color and mouthwatering acidity, this delicately structured Pinot goes well beyond its immediate flavors of raspberry tea, pomegranates, persimmons, orange peel, exotic spices and oak to offer a Burgundian touch of earth and mushrooms. There's also a firm, stony minerality on the palate. This gorgeous Pinot was produced in tiny quantities of 300 cases and will drink well over the next six years..
designation: Split Rail Vineyard.
points: 94.
price: 36.0.
province: California.
region_1: Santa Cruz Mountains.
region_2: Central Coast.
